servinfo.title: Immobilizer Indicator Lamp Remains ON after Engine Start

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: When the ignition switch is turned ON, ECM transmits the indication ON signal to the combination meter to turn ON the immobilizer indicator lamp in case that there is not any problem with the immobilizer control system. Then, the combination meter turns ON the lamp. When the engine is started up, ECM transmits the indication OFF signal to the combination meter to turn OFF the lamp. Then, the combination meter turns OFF the immobilizer indicator lamp. However, in case that there is some trouble with the immobilizer control system, the immobilizer indicator lamp flashes ON and OFF when the ignition switch is turned ON.

test1.ptxt: Check if any DTC is detected by ECM referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check .

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Control System Check .

testgroup.title: CAN communication wire circuits check

test1.ptxt: Check CAN communication wire circuits between combination meter and ECM referring to DTC P1674: CAN Communication (Bus Off Error) .

testgroup.question: Are wire circuits in good condition?

action.ptxt: Replace combination meter with a known-good one and recheck. If the immobilizer indicator lamp remains OFF, replace ECM with a known-good one and recheck.
